name: DreamHack Masters Winter
description: The DreamHack SC2 Masters Winter is the third and last online event of the ESL Pro Tour 2020/21 Circuit. It is organized by DreamHack in cooperation with ESL.

name: King of Battles: KB International Championship
description: The King of Battles: KB International Championship is a GSL style tournament, consisting of 16 players (8 Korean and 8 Non-Korean players) fighting for 1280 EPT Global Points and a $30,000 USD prize pool.

name: DreamHack Masters Fall
description: The DreamHack SC2 Masters Fall is the second of the three online events of the ESL Pro Tour 2020/21 Circuit. It is organized by DreamHack in cooperation with ESL.
